meanings.definition: A chemical group consisting of an oxygen atom bonded to a hydrogen atom.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the hydroxy group in the molecule.
meanings.sent2: Water is made up of two hydroxy groups.
meanings.sent3: The hydroxy group and the carbon atom walked into a bar.
meanings.sent4: The hydroxy group was like a bridge connecting the oxygen and hydrogen atoms.
meanings.sent5: The hydroxy group looked like a tiny oxygen-hydrogen duo.

meanings.definition: Relating to or containing hydroxyl groups.
meanings.sent1: The hydroxy compound reacted with the acid.
meanings.sent2: Her skincare product claimed to be hydroxy-rich.
meanings.sent3: The hydroxy lotion made her skin sparkle like diamonds.
meanings.sent4: His hydroxy personality always brought a refreshing vibe.
meanings.sent5: The hydroxy solution felt like a cool breeze on a hot day.
